details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.3.3 Annotations appearances - Normal appearance
details.description: If an annotation dictionary's Subtype key has value other than Widget, or if FT key associated with Widget annotation has value other than Btn, the value of the N key shall be an appearance stream.

rule.description: If an annotation dictionary's Subtype key has value other than Widget, or if FT key associated with Widget annotation has value other than Btn, the value of the N key shall be an appearance stream.

error.message: An annotation dictionary's Subtype key has a value %1 and its FT key has a value %2, but the value of the N key is not an appearance stream
